title: aiyan tiruvaDiyai
sahitya:
aiyan tiruvaDiyai viDamATTEn yArenna mozhindAlum Avi azhindAlum


anupallavi

  vaiyattu vAzvE maDittu muDindAlum vAnam iDindu talai mIdu vIzhndhAlum


caraNam    nAnAvidha nOigaL ellAm onrukUDi nADi narambugaLO-Delumbaiyum urukkinAlum
 mAnAbhimAnam izhanduDal uyir tuDittAlum marupadi Ayiram piravigaL eduttAlum
